name: Monster hints
description:
This game is about helping someone and overcoming the assumptions and prejudices. 

Play as a hunter who was summoned to the village to help local people to get rid of the monsters. To go successfully to the end you will have to be extremely open minded to new possibilities. Made in 48 hours for GDS Jam 2021 by team MAF. 

Team MAF:

Programming - Josef Gazdoš (https://icsharp.eu/)

Graphic design - Armstronjojomax (Luci) (https://www.instagram.com/justluciplease/)

Music composition - sci_maddy (https://sci-maddy.itch.io/)

Thanks to kenney.nl, https://bigsoundbank.com/, www.soundjay.com and http://www.gameburp.com/ for providing free SFX.
